settings.content: Handsling

Handsling track bikes are designed for racing on the velodrome, indoor or outdoor, and assembled to your exact fit – then painted on site in our UK workshop before being assembled to your exact fit. The UCI-approved carbon frames deliver the stiffness, control, and aerodynamic edge trusted by national champions.

FREE PAINT - Order before 31st January to get free paint (applies to Handsling colour palette only).
Every Handsling bike is fully configurable. Select your model and groupset to start creating your dream bike.

settings.title: Learn how Handsling can personalise your bike to your performance needs.
Sized to You
settings.content: Every Handsling track bike is custom-assembled to your exact measurements. Our Remote Tailored Sizing service puts you in an optimal position for racing on the velodrome from day one.

settings.title: Tailored to You
settings.content: Personalise your carbon track bike from gearing to paint finish. Select crank lengths, gear ratios, handlebar width, stem length, wheelset, and more – plus choose from over 130 paint options, applied in-house in the UK, to make your race machine unmistakably yours.

settings.title: Engineered for Performance
settings.content: Designed in-house by Handsling and assembled in the UK, our track bikes are trusted by elite riders with over 90 victories and counting.

settings.text: MAKE YOUR BIKE ONE OF A KIND

settings.content: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Ride experience
settings.content:
• Developed through elite-level racing feedback for perfectly balanced handling and control.
  • Aerodynamic frame profiles reduce drag while maintaining high lateral stiffness for instant power response.
  • Neutral yet responsive geometry ensures rock-solid stability in sprints and through long endurance efforts.
  • Tuned carbon lay-up delivers stiffness and control on every surface, from indoor boards to outdoor concrete tracks.

settings.title: Performance
settings.content:
• UCI-approved for international competition and raced by multiple national champions.
  • A proven championship winner at national and international level.
  • Optimised for endurance  events where stiffness and aerodynamic efficiency are critical.
  • Razor-sharp handling lets you carry speed smoothly around steeply banked turns.

settings.title: Frame Design and Manufacture
settings.content:
• Design inhouse by Handsling’s engineer
  • Manufactured by skilled technicians using bespoke tooling to control carbon lay-up.
  • Constructed from Toray carbon fibre for a high stiffness-to-weight ratio and exceptional durability.
  • Internal EPS moulding process increases carbon compaction, eliminating voids and ensuring consistent wall thickness.
  • Oversized head tube, bottom bracket shell, and chainstays maximise power transfer and steering precision.
  • Each frame tested beyond ISO standards to guarantee long-term reliability under race stress.

settings.title: Bike Customisation
settings.content:
• Assembled in the UK to your exact sizing, gearing, and component preferences.
  • Choice of premium drivetrains and finishing kits from Shimano, Rotor, and Miche.
  • Select crank length, chainring and sprocket size, handlebar width and stem length, and wheelset to match your event and cadence.
  • Over 130 paint options plus limited-edition colourways available for a truly custom look.
  • Remote Tailored Sizing service ensures an optimal aerodynamic fit before the bike leaves the workshop.

settings.title: Customer Service
settings.content:
• Ongoing support from Handsling’s experienced track specialists for setup, gearing, and upgrades.
  • Direct access to the same technical team that supports our professional riders.
  • Transparent build communication from order to delivery.
  • Every frame is covered by a limited lifetime warranty for total peace of mind.

settings.title: Handsling TR3evo Carbon Track Bike
settings.content:
Developed alongside professional riders and proven in international championships, the TR3evo is the ultimate endurance carbon track bike. Combining aerodynamic tubing, stable geometry, and elite-level stiffness, it converts every watt into speed.

UCI-approved and assembled in the UK, it represents the best all round track bike for every discipline.

Race-Winning Performance, Tailored to You

A frame shaped by victory – trusted by professionals, refined by competition, and ready for your next race.

settings.title: Ride experience
settings.content:
• Developed through elite-level testing to balance aerodynamics and speed with stability and handling precision.
  • The bespoke carbon cockpit provides adjustability for your ideal pursuit position within UCI regulations.
  • Super-stiff carbon lay-up converts every watt into forward motion without flex or power loss.
  • Smooth, high speed stability builds rider confidence lap after lap.
  • Stiff and responsive, the TR2evoPis the perfect modern track cycling bike built to dominate timed events.

settings.title: Performance
settings.content:
• UCI-approved and compliant for international pursuit and endurance competition.
  • Aerodynamically refined for maximum efficiency against the clock.
  • Engineered for exceptional stiffness, ensuring consistent power transfer from start gate to finish line.
  • Proven at national level by riders chasing record times on the velodrome.
  • Balanced geometry keeps handling predictable and smooth even at full race pace.

settings.title: Frame Design and Manufacture
settings.content:
• Designed in-house by Handsling’s engineering team specifically for pursuit racing.
  • Constructed using Toray carbon fibre for high stiffness-to-weight performance.
  • Internal EPS moulding ensures superior carbon compaction and consistency across every frame.
  • Oversized junctions at the head tube, bottom bracket, and chainstays optimise torsional rigidity and control.
  • The TR2evoP has undergone rigorous testing exceeding ISO standards to guarantee long-term reliability.

settings.title: Bike Customisation
settings.content:
• Hand-assembled in the UK to match your bikefit and pursuit setup.
  • Choice of premium components from Shimano, Rotor, and Miche,and a wide selection of track wheels are available.
  • Customise crank lengths, gearing ratios, stem lengths, and handlebar widths for precise ergonomic fit.
  • Over 130 paint options and finishes for a one-of-a-kind track bike.
  • Remote Tailored Sizing ensures a perfect aerodynamic position before delivery.

settings.title: Customer Service
settings.content:
• Direct, ongoing support from Handsling’s track cycling specialists based in the UK.
  • The same expert team that builds bikes for professional riders will build yours.
  • Guidance on gearing, position, and upgrades tailored to your pursuit goals.
  • Transparent communication from design to delivery.
  • Every frame backed by a limited lifetime warranty for confidence that lasts.

settings.title: Handsling TR2evoP Carbon Track Bike
settings.content:
Every aspect of the TR2evoP track bike is engineered for pursuit race excellence – from its aero-tuned tube profiles to the bespoke carbon cockpit that locks in your most efficient position. Lightweight, rigid, and ruthlessly fast, it turns marginal gains into real seconds on the stopwatch.

UCI-approved and assembled in the UK, it’s the pursuit specialist’s choice for pure power, perfect line control, and podium-level performance.

Pure Aero Power, Tuned for the Boards

Customise your TR2evoP and have it precision-built to your exact racing position.

settings.title: Ride experience
settings.content:
• Developed for elite sprinters to deliver instant response and unwavering control under full power.
  • Super-stiff carbon lay-up eliminates flex, turning every watt into acceleration.
  • Stable geometry is confidence inspiring and provides reliable handling feedback on track, and through each banked curve.
  • Bespoke, ergonomic and super stiff carbon sprint bars provide leverage for explosive starts and full-gas efforts.
  • Designed to dominate the boards, the TR2evoS sprint track cycling bike stays planted even under the heaviest torque.

settings.title: Performance
settings.content:
• Engineered with a special carbon lay-up to maximise power transfer under sprint loads.
  • Stiffness is tuned for explosive acceleration and immediate response from the start gate.
  • UCI-approved and tested for elite-level competition on velodromes worldwide.
  • Aerodynamic tube shaping maintains speed while reducing drag through high-velocity sprints.
  • Designed for riders who demand direct, measurable performance in every effort.

settings.title: Frame Design and Manufacture
settings.content:
• Designed in-house by Handsling engineers exclusively for sprint racing.
  • Constructed from Toray carbon fibre for ultimate stiffness and impact resistance.
  • Internal EPS moulding ensures perfect carbon compaction for structural consistency and durability.
  • Oversized bottom bracket, chainstays, and head tube provide direct power delivery and steering precision.
  • Rigorously tested beyond ISO standards, guaranteeing reliability under extreme sprint forces.

settings.title: Bike Customisation
settings.content:
• Hand-assembled in the UK to your sprint position, gearing, and event setup.
  • Premium sprint-ready components from Shimano, Rotor, and Miche, paired with Walker Brothers wheels.
  • Customisable crank lengths, chainrings, sprockets, and stem lengths, for fine-tuned ergonomics.
  • Over 130 custom paint options for a unique, race-ready finish.
  • Remote Tailored Sizing service ensures your bike fits perfectly before it leaves the workshop.

settings.title: Customer Service
settings.content:
• Access to Handsling’s dedicated UK-based track specialists for setup, sprint gearing, and performance support.
  • The same expert team that builds frames for elite riders will assemble yours.
  • Guidance throughout your build – from fit consultation to post-race tuning advice.
  • Transparent, personal communication at every stage of the custom process.
  • Every frame is covered by a limited lifetime warranty for complete racing confidence.

settings.title: Handsling TR2evoS Carbon Track Bike
settings.content:
Designed for the demands of world-class sprinting, the TR2evoS transforms peak rider power output into explosive forward motion. The carbon frame is brutally stiff yet precisely controlled, reacting instantly to every pedal stroke.

UCI-approved and UK-assembled, the TR2evoS track bike converts raw sprinting power into maximum speed.

Tailored to Harness Your Sprint Power

The TR2evoS is a sprint bike with one mission – maximum acceleration with zero hesitation. Built to your fit and your finish, for your fastest times yet.

The TR3evo's simple yet elegant design allows for any configuration imaginable and makes adjustments a breeze with a distinct lack of “proprietary” parts that seem to plague the cycling industry.

The simple yet elegant design allows for any configuration imaginable and makes adjustments a breeze. It does all of this without sacrificing any of the control, stiffness, aerodynamics, or power transfer that riders demand of their equipment.

One of a kind. That’s how I would describe the TR3evo. Its reliable, responsive, and above all fast. When racing or training the stiffness of the frame allows the maximum amount of power possible to be transferred from body to bike.

settings.title: Double Gold for Sam Fisher at the British Track Nationals
settings.content: Rising star Sam Fisher powered his Handsling TR3evo to two senior gold medals at the British National Track Championships – winning both the Scratch Race and Team Pursuit. Fellow Handsling riders Amelia Cass and Frankie Hall also claimed silver and bronze medals in their events, proving the TR3evo’s speed, control, and stiffness on the national stage.

settings.title: Dave Heald – UCI Masters World Track Champion
settings.content: On his custom TR2evoS, Dave Heald stormed to gold in the Individual Time Trial and silver in the Sprint at the UCI Masters World Track Championships in Roubaix. Built to handle explosive power, his carbon sprint track bike mirrored the setup used by Handsling’s elite riders.

settings.title: TR3evo Bikes in the UCI Track Champions League
settings.content: The Handsling TR3evo made its mark in the UCI Track Champions League in 2024, when world-class riders raced at maximum intensity across sprint and endurance events. Its aerodynamic carbon frame, stiffness, and balance showcase the same technology available to every Handsling rider – tested and trusted at the highest level of velodrome cycling.

settings.title: Proven on the Boards: Our Track Bikes in Competition
settings.content: In national, international and world championships, riders trust their performance to the same geometry, stiffness, and fit we deliver in every tailor-made track bike. Explore the stories of real riders, then build your own race-winning machine.

Every Handsling track bike carries its rider’s story. Whether you match your team kit or make a statement on the boards, your paint choice is part of your identity. Each frame is painted in-house by our UK team. With 130+ finishes and British-assembled precision, your bike will look as good as it rides.

settings.title: Which Handsling carbon track bike is best for me – TR3evo, TR2evoP, or TR2evoS?
settings.content:
TR3evo: the all-round carbon track bike for endurance racing and bunch events – stiff, aero, stable.
TR2evoP: pursuit-focused, aero-tuned for speed against the clock and sustained power.
TR2evoS: sprint specialist – maximum stiffness and instant response for starts, keirin, flying 200s.

Unsure? Our consultation service and Remote Tailored Sizing will align a model, gearing, and cockpit to your goals.

settings.title: Are carbon track bikes worth it for beginners?
settings.content: If you plan to race, or progress fast, yes. Carbon track bikes are lighter, stiffer and more aerodynamic. Start on sensible ratios, then evolve the cockpit and wheels. You’ll keep the same race-proven frame that’s delivered 90+ elite victories, with an upgrade path as your speed grows.

settings.title: Are carbon track bikes faster than aluminium or steel on indoor velodromes?
settings.content: Typically, yes. Carbon lets us design more aerodynamic frame profiles and a lay-up that has better stiffness-to-weight, meaning fewer watts lost to flex and drag. On track that translates to higher speeds, and easier maintenance of that speed during hard efforts.

settings.title: What’s the difference between a track bike and a fixed gear bike for the road?
settings.content: A track bike is a purpose-built racing bicycle for velodrome cycling: fixed gear, no brakes, tight geometry and UCI-compliant dimensions. A road “fixed gear bike” often adds brakes, has more room for bigger road tyres, and a more relaxed geometry.

settings.title: What crank length is best for sprint vs endurance on track cycling bikes?
settings.content: Though it is down to personal preference, we recommend 165mm cranks with all of our track frames.

settings.title: Do you offer fittings in the UK before I order my track bike?
settings.content: Yes. You can book a fitting/consultation at our Hampshire facility. We’ll review your measurements or existing fit, discuss your target events, gearing and wheel choices, and finalise a custom specification so your track bike arrives ready for your local velodrome. To arrange a visit, contact sales@handslingbikes.com or call 01420 612700.

settings.title: What lead times should I expect for a custom-built track bike?
settings.content: A Handsling custom track bike is ready in around 4-6 weeks, depending on paint and component choices. Once your order  is confirmed, we’ll book your paint slot, and once the frame has completed painting, we then assemble and quality check your bike in the UK. We will always keep you updated from order to handover.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Learn about Handsling bikes and what separates us from the competition. For questions on ordering, delivery, maintenance, and much more, go to our support centre.

Outside of track, you’ll find the rest of the lineup here: carbon road bikes, road race bikes, endruance road bikes, gravel bikes, allroad bikes, time trial bikes and triathlon bikes.

All Handsling bikes are unisex – with a tailored build to suit proportions and position for both men and women.
